comment: Max tries to stop the inevitable: electoral extermination of the Democrats. "Conservative columnist Max Boot called out President Donald Trump and Fox Newsfor 'demagoguery,' 'racism' and 'nativism' in their comments about the caravan of refugees that recently crossed the Mexico-Guatemala border." He conveniently ignores the photo in the addendum.
amr:
# ::snt Max tries to stop the inevitable: electoral extermination of the Democrats. "Conservative columnist Max Boot called out President Donald Trump and Fox Newsfor 'demagoguery,' 'racism' and 'nativism' in their comments about the caravan of refugees that recently crossed the Mexico-Guatemala border." He conveniently ignores the photo in the addendum.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / try-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Max"
                        :op2 "Boot")
                  :mod (c / columnist

            :ARG1 (s / stop-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (e / exterminate-01

                                    :ARG1 (p3 / political-party
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Democrat"))
                                    :ARG2 (m2 / member)))
                        :ARG1-of (a / avoid-01
                              :ARG1-of (p4 / possible-01
                                    :polarity -)))))
      :snt2 (c3 / call-out-15
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p5 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Donald"
                              :op2 "Trump")
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (p6 / president)))
                  :op2 (b / broadcast-program
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Fox"
                              :op2 "News")))
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (d / demagogue-01)
                  :op2 (r / racism)
                  :op3 (n5 / nativist))
            :medium (c4 / comment-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG3 (e2 / event
                        :mod (r2 / refugee
                              :ARG0-of (c5 / cross-02
                                    :ARG1 (b2 / border-01
                                          :ARG1 (c6 / country
                                                :name (n6 / name
                                                      :op1 "Mexico"))
                                          :ARG2 (c7 / country
                                                :name (n7 / name
                                                      :op1 "Guatemala")))
                                    :time (r3 / recent)))))
            :snt3 (ii / ignore-01
                  :ARG0 (h3 / he)
                  :ARG1 (p7 / photo)
                  :location (a4 / addendum)
                  :manner (c8 / convenient))))
